subject: Faulty accelerator load cell
description_text:
hi, I plugged in my pedal set (plus X) and when I begin the calibration process the accelerator seems to have a problem. the brake and clutch show a steady number when are not pressed, the accelerator number keeps changing by itself. is this a sign of a faulty load cell?

The video showing the problem is attached below

conversations.body_text: Hi Edoardo Castriotti,  This is normal, and you can also adjust it by setting an offset for correction.Â
